name: Ethiopian Split Pea stew - Kik Alicha. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: This Ethiopian Kik Alicha - Split Pea stew is a simple warm stew with just 6 ingredients. Serve with Injera, flatbread or rice.. Vegan Gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup dry split yellow peas (soak overnight or 2 hours)
1/4 cup dry split green peas (soak overnight or 2 hours)
Add a 1/2 teaspoon berbere spice blend for a spicier Wat version

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the split peas overnight or at least 2 hours in warm water, drain and rinse.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the split peas overnight or at least 2 hours in warm water, drain and rinse.

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan, add oil, add onions, ginger and garlic and cook stirring occasionally, until translucent.(add chopped Serrano or Jalapeno if using)
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan, add oil, add onions, ginger and garlic and cook stirring occasionally, until translucent.(add chopped Serrano or Jalapeno if using)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the turmeric and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the turmeric and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add rinsed split peas, salt, pepper and water. Mix, cover and bring to a boil on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add rinsed split peas, salt, pepper and water. Mix, cover and bring to a boil on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low and simmer, partially covered for 35-45 minutes or until peas have softened to your desired consistency. Taste and adjust salt and spice if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to low and simmer, partially covered for 35-45 minutes or until peas have softened to your desired consistency. Taste and adjust salt and spice if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Or use a Pressure cooker: Pressure cook for 1 whistle on high and then on low for 15 minutes. ( Pressure cook for 8 to 10 minutes after the pressure is reached for electric pressure cooker, then natural release). The pictures are of the pressure cooked stew.
recipeInstructions.name: Or use a Pressure cooker: Pressure cook for 1 whistle on high and then on low for 15 minutes. ( Pressure cook for 8 to 10 minutes after the pressure is reached for electric pressure cooker, then natural release). The pictures are of the pressure cooked stew.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the peas if desired. Add some lemon juice if desired and serve. Tastes best with a sour flat bread like Injera.
